title: Flights to Lukla halted for three days due to adverse weather
description: LUKLA: Flights to Tenzing-Hillary Airport in Lukla, the gateway to Mount Everest, have been suspended for the past three days due to continuous rainfall and fog covering the sky. With flights halted, hotels from Lukla to Namche Bazaar are now fully occupied b…
content:
LUKLA: Flights to Tenzing-Hillary Airport in Lukla, the gateway to Mount Everest, have been suspended for the past three days due to continuous rainfall and fog covering the sky.
